hero.title: Streamline Your Service Booking
hero.description: B-Calendar helps service providers manage bookings, schedules, and clients all in one place. Perfect for cleaning services, photographers, hairdressers, and more.

features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your service bookings efficiently

realTimeBookings.description: Allow clients to book services in real-time with instant confirmation

secureAccess.title: Secure Access
secureAccess.description: Role-based access control for companies and executors

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about B-Calendar

businessTypes.question: What types of businesses can use B-Calendar?
businessTypes.answer: B-Calendar is designed for any service-based business that requires appointment scheduling. This includes cleaning services, wedding photographers, hairdressers, consultants, and many more.

executorRole.question: How does the executor role work?
executorRole.answer: Executors are the service providers who perform the actual services. Companies can add executors to their account, assign services to them, and manage their schedules. Executors can log in to view their assigned orders, services, and client information.

integration.question: Can I integrate B-Calendar with my website?
integration.answer: Yes, B-Calendar provides a booking widget that you can embed on your website. This allows your clients to book services directly from your website without having to navigate to a separate platform.

mobileApp.question: Is there a mobile app available?
mobileApp.answer: Currently, B-Calendar is a web-based application optimized for both desktop and mobile browsers. A dedicated mobile app is on our roadmap for future development.

security.question: How secure is my data?
security.answer: We take security seriously. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We implement role-based access control to ensure that only authorized users can access specific information.
